policies.title: Memory Sovereignty Protocol
policies.summary: All WisdomMemory data is local-first, encrypted, and owned by the user. User has the right to redacting, masking, and exporting any data point at any time.
policies.changelog: Initial release, aligned with Local-First Architecture v0.9.

policies.title: Agent Override & Audit Protocol
policies.summary: Every agent action and model invocation is logged in the immutable Decision Explorer. Users can request alternate reasoning ('Show Reasoning') or pause the agent at any time.
policies.changelog: Includes new 'Flag This Decision' logging path to WisdomMemory.

policies.title: Crisis Signal Escalation
policies.summary: The Sentinel Agent monitors for critical threshold events (e.g., self-harm, financial panic) and immediately routes to the Crisis Signal Pipeline, overriding all other agent logic.
policies.changelog: Initial integration with time-aware override control.
